div.p: Use the below health organizations for reliable information on COVID-19. Each website contains information on:

li.p: What to do if you are sick with COVID-19
What to do if someone in your house is sick with COVID-19

What Every Elementary/Middle School Student Needs to Know About the Coronavirus: Free event: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/what-every-elementarymiddle-student-needs-to-know-about-the-coronavirus-tickets-99881837264
